extension.description: Easy Build Install UFO Build Wizard / ##CREDIT TO LEE @ COMMUNITY BUILDS FOR WRITING THE FORCE CLOSE FUNCTION AND ANY OTHER DEVS WHO CREATED ANY MODULES USED##
Area-51 - Live TV / PPV / Sports / Kids / Movies / Entertainment at an affordable price for all.
Area 51 X :: Visit http://area-51-hosting.host

[COLOR yellow]PLEASE READ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/COLOR][COLOR lightblue] Welcome to the Galaxy addon from Area-51. Please Read and accept the terms below to continue. Galaxy Kodi addon is absolutely legal and only contains links to other websites on the Internet. It does not host or upload any videos, films, or media files. The Galaxy Kodi addon simply aggregates links in a convenient, user-friendly interface. Galaxy is not responsible for the accuracy, compliance, copyright, legality, decency, or any other aspect of the content of others linked sites. If you have any legal issue please contact the appropriate media file owners or host of these sites. Any legal issues regarding the free online TV shows or Movies on this 3rd party Kodi addon should be taken up with the actual file host and providers themselves, as Galaxy is not affiliated with them. All copyrights of TV shows, movies, and videos is reserved by the copyright owner(s). Use Galaxy at your own risk. [/COLOR]

extension.news: [add] Python 3 compat. [add] Settings -> Maintenance -> Delete temporary files [add] Settings -> General -> Rate video after watching [add] Settings -> API -> Enable API configuration page - when enabled, visit http://ipaddress:port/api to configure API keys from a web browser - port is configured in Settings - HTTP Server - Port [chg] Storing personal api keys in api_keys.json [chg] Storing login tokens in access_manager.json [add] youtube_registration module, register developer keys and use them by appending an addon_id=:addon_id parameter to youtube add-on plugin urls [add] screensaver=true parameter to /play route - no suggested videos, no post play events, don't ask for quality [add] play route for channel live streams - plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?channel_id=UCLA_DiR1FfKNvjuUpBHmylQ&live=1 [fix] search input, now works with Yatse [fix] Signature deciphering [fix] context menu after playback [fix] alternative player, do not append headers [fix/upd] post play events happen post play [fix/upd] set title from metadata on play [upd] Use monitor to track api key changes [upd] Dutch strings [MB1968] [upd] French strings [bubuleur] [upd] Greek strings [twilight0] [upd] Spanish strings [roliverosc]

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.

extension.summary: UFO TV Guide allows you to combine some of your favourite live TV plugins for use with a fully working EPG
extension.description: UFO TV Guide allows you to combine some of your favourite live TV plugins for use with a fully working EPG
extension.disclaimer: UFO TV Guide is based on Renegades TV Guide by Renegades Team and FTV Guide by Bluezed and RayW1986, which is based on the original TV Guide addon by twinther.
